issues.title: Implement user authentication system
issues.description: Need to add JWT-based authentication with login and signup functionality. Should include password hashing and session management.

issues.title: Fix navbar responsive design on mobile
issues.description: The navigation bar breaks on screens smaller than 768px. Menu items overlap and the hamburger menu doesn't work properly.

issues.title: Add dark mode support
issues.description: Implement a dark mode theme toggle that persists user preference in localStorage. Should apply across all pages.

issues.title: Database performance optimization
issues.description: Queries are taking too long on the dashboard page. Need to add proper indexing and optimize N+1 queries.

issues.title: Update documentation for API endpoints
issues.description: API documentation is outdated. Need to update with new endpoints added in v2.0 and add examples for each endpoint.

issues.title: Add file upload functionality
issues.description: Users should be able to upload images and documents. Need to implement file validation, size limits, and storage solution.

issues.title: Memory leak in dashboard component
issues.description: Dashboard component doesn't clean up subscriptions properly, causing memory leaks when navigating away. Browser becomes slow after multiple visits.

issues.title: Add email notifications
issues.description: Send email notifications when users are assigned to tasks or when tasks are updated. Should be configurable in user settings.

issues.title: Improve search functionality
issues.description: Current search only looks at titles. Should also search in descriptions and tags. Add filters for status and assignee.

issues.title: Fix CORS errors on production
issues.description: API requests failing on production environment due to CORS configuration. Works fine in development.

issues.title: Add data export feature
issues.description: Allow users to export their data in CSV and JSON formats. Should include all issues and filters.

issues.title: Setup automated testing pipeline
issues.description: Configure CI/CD with automated tests. Should run unit tests, integration tests, and E2E tests on every PR.
